#cloud-config
# See readme file for the project for details on what this does

package_upgrade: true 

packages: 
    - apt-transport-https
    - docker-ce

# Defines apt repositories to install from and relevant keys needed. Sources are saved at /etc/apt/sources.list.d
apt:
    preserve_sources_list: true

    sources:
        https.list:
            source: "deb http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu xenial-security main"
            
        docker.list:
            source: "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu xenial stable"
            keyid: 0EBFCD88 #docker gpg key
            keyserver: hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80
            
# Defines the users to be added to the server and assigns groups
users:
    - name: gov
      ssh-authorized-keys:
          - ssh-rsa  govind.suresh1@gmail.com
      sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
      groups: sudo, docker
      shell: /bin/bash

    - name: neel
      ssh-authorized-keys:
          - ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIEL77BGUTC78fLo/kvSrVDkJ/KPvJA7m2wHGTq7ACd/w
      sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
      groups: sudo, docker
      shell: /bin/bash
     
    - name: jon
      ssh-authorized-keys:
          - ssh-rsa 
      sudo: ['ALL=(All) NOPASSWD:ALL']
      groups: sudo, docker
      shell: /bin/bash

write_files:
    - path: /etc/ssh/sshd_config
      content: |
          Port 22
          Protocol 2
          HostKey /etc/ssh/ssh_host_rsa_key
          HostKey /etc/ssh/ssh_host_dsa_key
          HostKey /etc/ssh/ssh_host_ecdsa_key
          HostKey /etc/ssh/ssh_host_ed25519_key
          UsePrivilegeSeparation yes
          KeyRegenerationInterval 3600
          ServerKeyBits 1024
          SyslogFacility AUTH
          LogLevel INFO
          LoginGraceTime 120
          PermitRootLogin no
          StrictModes yes
          RSAAuthentication yes
          PubkeyAuthentication yes
          IgnoreRhosts yes
          RhostsRSAAuthentication no
          HostbasedAuthentication no
          PermitEmptyPasswords no
          ChallengeResponseAuthentication no
          X11Forwarding yes
          X11DisplayOffset 10
          PrintMotd no
          PrintLastLog yes
          TCPKeepAlive yes
          AcceptEnv LANG LC_*
          Subsystem sftp /usr/lib/openssh/sftp-server
          UsePAM yes
          AllowUsers gov neel jon
